paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant p.L552S, including penetrance data for asymptomatic and symptomatic carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One of the mutation carriers (1) is an asymptomatic 19-year-old male.
The other mutation carrier (2) is a symptomatic 44-year-old female.

functional_data.summary: The p.L552S mutation was studied in hiPSC-CMs, showing differences in calcium dynamics and arrhythmia susceptibility.

variants.segregation_data: The p.L552S mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the functional differences between asymptomatic and symptomatic carriers of the p.L552S mutation.
key_quotes: Our results highlighted that hiPSC-CM models can reveal phenotypical differences of mutation carriers with different clinical findings.
The p.L552S mutation from our study was a missense mutation located on the transmembrane α-helix of segment S5 forming the pore of the α-subunits of the HERG channel.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 variant p.L552S was successfully extracted.
